channel.title: Indian Democracy on Balachandar Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Indian Democracy on Balachandar Blog

item.title: Karnataka 2018 Election - A Data Story
item.description: Most Popular Parties Vote-Share of Popular Parties Number of Constituencies Won and Lost Candidates who saved their deposits Candidate who doesn’t get more than one-sixth of votes polled in Constituency loses his deposit. Histogram of Vote-shares Smoothened histogram after normalizing for difference in number of contested seats. Histogram of Vote-shares in Seats Won Smoothened histogram after normalizing for difference in number of seats won.

item.title: Uttar Pradesh 2017 Election - A Data Story
item.description: Most Popular Parties Vote-share and Long-Tail Win/Loss Count Note: There were 1000+ Independent candidates contesting across constituencies Who lost their deposits? Party which doesn’t get more than one-sixth of votes polled in Constituency loses its deposit. Note: There were 1000+ Independent candidates contesting across constituencies Histogram of Vote-shares After Normalizing: Smoothened histogram after normalizing for difference in number of contested seats.
